```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```


Read in data 

```{r}
ucsb_grad <- read.csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment, color = ethnicity)) +
  geom_col()
```
